Not exactly business related but have to boast a little...going to see Warrant perform tonight.  The lead singer for the past 5 years is a friend of mine and I can't wait to say hi again.  Last time I saw Robert was when were standing in line waiting to get into the Ted Nugent concert a couple months back.  Also performing is Deirdra and the drummer for that band is Roberts old drummer from the Dr. Ruth days,  Dwain Miller.  It will be good to see him again as well.  Working hard on several projects...thanks to all my new clients!
Late-Night Senate Tax Vote May Be 'Disastrous' For New Jersey
Beautiful morning to walk a Forte Custom Home under construction in Ahwatukee

With the lull in design work I needed to find a new outlet for my creativity.  I have written a novel called Serpent.  Serpent is available on Kindle and in paperback on Amazon.com and many other great book web sites.  Simply search for Serpent by Ron Darling. If you love Brad Thor, Vince Flynn, Clive Cussler, or any of the action adventure authors you might just like my little story.  Nick Washburn is the one they call "That Guy".  He solves the problems no one else can.  Terrorists at home and abroad fear his reach, and he always gets his man.  The Serpent, a Jihadist terrorist has planted bombs in all 48 continental States and is threatening to detonate them if his demands are not met.  Nick must locate and destroy the Serpent before he can act on his threat.

Blessed with the talent to create truly beautiful home designs, Ron and his wife Nancy have been working with clients to make their vision and dreams come true since the late 1970's. With the nationwide boom in housing back on track again they look forward to expanding out all across this great nation to provide their services to those looking to build their dream home, builders looking to maximize profits on spec. home projects and developers looking to put together that perfect community with homes that people will enjoy for decades.  Currently they have projects in progress in Scottsdale, on Camelback Mountain in Phoenix, Las Vegas, and North Carolina.  Looking to expand they are working with builders and developers in Texas, Washington State, Montana and Utah to put together designs for various projects.Let's add your project to that list.  Better design, construction drawings that builders can build from, knowledge, experience and talent combining to give you the best design service experience possible.

I specialize in custom homes ranging in size from 4,000 livable sq. ft. to over 10,000 sq. ft.  My typical projects are valued between $1.5 Million and $5 million.  Clients looking for a home that fits their needs and wants can trust me to give you a home that you will love from day one and a home that when your family and friends walk in the first time...they will say....WOW, I could live here.  Not only are my designs tailored to match each client with a level of perfection few other Architects and Designers can achieve my knowledge of construction allows me to create plans for your home that your builder can easily build from and that will save you money in costly changes required due to errors or omissions so many other firms have in their work.
Graduated with highest grade point average in the schools history

A unique trade school where I received instruction from a man who knew the field of architecture and design well.  I learned a great deal at this school, and it was a great jump start to my career in residential architecture   The school closed a few years after I attended, but the lessons I learned there put me on the right path, teaching me that knowing everything I can about what I design and draw is as important as the talent to design I am blessed with.

Licensed Mortgage Originator at Supreme Lending
September 19, 2011, Jim was a client of Ron’s

I hired Ron in 2004 after my wife and I purchased a ranch style home which needed remodeling.  Ron centered his attention on our needs and was able to execute a detailed game plan for the home to be remodeled.  His work provided us inspiration to move walls, create a better floorplan and all the while provide continuity to the success of a beautifully designed home.  Ron is an excellent designer who can help a wide range of home projects.

summary: When someone chooses to have a new custom home designed, be it a personal family home, a second vacation home, or a builder looking to create the most sellable spec home possible I have been specializing is exceeding my clients expectations since 1987 out of Scottsdale, AZ.  I have designed homes in seven western states and now I have expanded to doing homes all over the nation.  Projects in Montana, Texas and the Seattle area are upcoming as well as North Carolina when I am designing a great home on a river front lot.  My projects vary greatly, with budgets as low as $300,000.00 to homes valued at over $5 million dollars. No matter where you are, or where your new home project will be built, I'd love to discuss the possibility of working with you. If you are looking to have a home built and need a designer who really cares about your needs and wants, or if you are a builder looking to create that near perfect spec project that sells faster and for more profit, or even if you are a realtor with a client who has a home that needs to be redesigned on paper to help it sell...I can meet and exceed your expectations.Specialties: Custom home designerAddition designerRemodel designerConstruction documentsNovelist
